quote: Focus. Your first product will scale farther than you think.
Churn is not solved with triage. Solve it upstream.
The future is in your hands. Sam has spoken.
Product-market fit is not a destination. It's a journey.
Your first 10 customers will teach you more than any book.
Revenue solves most problems. Focus there first.
Hire for culture, train for skills. The reverse never works.
Your biggest competitor is your customer's status quo.
Pricing is a feature. Don't treat it like an afterthought.
The best marketing is a product that sells itself.
Founder-led sales is not a phase. It's a superpower.
Your roadmap should be written in pencil, not stone.
The customer is always right about their problem. Not the solution.
Burn rate is a choice. Make it intentional.
The best time to raise money is when you don't need it.
